titleStmt.title: The sorrowful mother, or, The pious daughters last farewel. She patiently did run her race, believ'd the word of truth; and death did willingly embrace, tho' in her blooming youth. To the tune of, Troy Town. This may be printed, R.P.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Deacon, at the Angel in Guilt-Spur-street.,

notesStmt.note: Date and place of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "Dear mother, I alas! must leave ..."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library and the British Library.
